name: ECO-FLEX 9500 (Hybrid)
description: Eco-Flex 9500 (Hybrid) is a one component, high modulus, mildew resistant multipurpose silyl-terminated polyether (hybrid) elastomeric sealant and adhesive. When fully cured, this unique VOC compliant formula offers UV stability and firm bonding to PVC, concrete, glass, aluminum, painted surfaces, wood, plywood, marble, metal, plus many other common substrates. This product is specifically formulated to offer all weather performance to meet today's Green Building Standards.
